Settings
Item Icon
denotes “caret”. It is used as the exponentiation operator. e.g., 2 ^ 3 = 2 x 2 x 2 = 8.
denotes “root”. It will perform the square root function. For example, √4 means square root of 4 i.e., 2.
denotes “exponent”. It means \'multipied by ten to the power of\'. For example, 3E7 means 3 x (10^7) which is 30,000,000.
denotes “percentage”. It is the symbol used to indicate a percentage, a number or ratio as a fraction of 100.

denotes “division”. It is used to represent the mathematical operation of division. The number written before the sign is the one to be divided and the number written after the sign is the one which divides.
denotes “multiplication”. It is used to represent the mathematical operation of multiplication.
denotes “addition”. It is used to represent the mathematical operation of addition.

denotes “subtraction”. It is used to represent the mathematical operation of subtraction. The number which is written after the sign is the one which is to be subtracted and the one which is written before the sign is the one from which it has to be subtracted.
denotes “is equal to”. It is used to represent the mathematical operation of equality.
denotes “start bracket”. It is used to start a bracket. The default operator between start bracket and the number preceding it is ×.
denotes “end bracket”. It is used to start a bracket. The default operator between end bracket and the number succeeding it is ×.
denotes “clear”. It will clear the calculation screen and you can start a new calculation.
denotes “save”. It will save the calculation for further reference. Not only the answer, but also the full expression.
denotes “backspace”. It deletes the character at the current position and moves the display cursor one position backwards.
denotes "paste". To paste clipboard items on the display.
denotes "Copy". It copies the task to the clipboard to paste it anywhere.
Founded in 2015 and based in New Delhi, India, Grexoft Developers is a place for developing simple and easy-to-use Mobile apps. Our products are designed to target daily needs of a common man.
Grexoft Developers was formed by enthusiastic, knowledgeable and hard-working experienced professionals with the objective to develop products of daily-use and back them with world-class support.
